name: CO()LAI
description:
CoolAI is a strategy and action platformer where you have to collaborate with your AI to collect coins, active doors, explode things and you have to keep the AI alive

CREDITS -

Free Game GUI by pzUH - https://pzuh.itch.io/free-game-gui

Rest all Art & Scripts Made By Me.
